title: How Many Calories in Wings?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in wings (chicken), including per-wing nutrition, protein, fat, carbs, and variations for baked or fried.
assumptions: Medium-sized chicken wing (~42g), with skin, roasted, no sauce or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, preparation (baked/fried), brand, and added sauces. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wing with skin provides ~99 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add buffalo sauce (1 tbsp per wing)

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for a medium roasted wing with skin.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~8 g protein per wing, making them a good lean option when skinless.

faqs.q: How do fried wings compare to baked?
faqs.a: Fried wings add ~50 kcal per wing due to oil absorption.

faqs.q: What about calories in buffalo wings?
faqs.a: Sauce adds 20-50 kcal per wing; total ~120-150 kcal.
Plain wings have 0 g carbs; breading or sauce increases this.
